00019 #define LEARNING_RATE 0.001
00020 #define MOMENTUM 0.9
00021 #define MAX_EPOCHS 1500
00022 #define DESIRED_ACCURACY 90  
00023 #define DESIRED_MSE 0.001 
00024 
00025 /*******************************************************************
00026 * Basic Gradient Descent Trainer with Momentum and Batch Learning
00027 ********************************************************************/
00028 class neuralNetworkTrainer{
00029         //class members
00030         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00032 private:
00033 
00034         neuralNetwork *NN_;     //network to be trained
00035 
00036         //learning parameters
00037         double learningRate_;           // adjusts the step size of the weight update   
00038         double momentum_;                       // improves performance of stochastic learning (don't use for batch)
00039 
00040         long epoch_;//epoch counter
00041         long maxEpochs_;
00042         
00043         //accuracy/MSE required
00044         double desiredAccuracy_;
00045         
00046         //change to weights
00047         double **deltaInputHidden_;
00048         double ***deltaHiddenHidden_;
00049         double **deltaHiddenOutput_;
00050 
00051         //error gradients
00052         double **hiddenErrorGradients_;
00053         double *outputErrorGradients_;
00054 
00055         //accuracy stats per epoch
00056         double trainingSetAccuracy_;
00057         double validationSetAccuracy_;
00058         double generalizationSetAccuracy_;
00059         double trainingSetMSE_;
00060         double validationSetMSE_;
00061         double generalizationSetMSE_;
00062 
00063         //batch learning flag
00064         bool useBatch_;
00065 
00066         //log file handle
00067         bool loggingEnabled_;
00068         std::fstream logFile_;
00069         int logResolution_;
00070         int lastEpochLogged_;
00071 
00072         //public methods
00073         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 public: 
00075         
00076         neuralNetworkTrainer( neuralNetwork &untrainedNetwork );
00077         void setTrainingParameters( double lR, double m, bool batch );
00078         void setStoppingConditions( int mEpochs, double dAccuracy);
00079         void useBatchLearning( bool flag ){ useBatch_ = flag; }
00080         void enableLogging( const char* filename, int resolution );
00081 
00082         void trainNetwork(  trainingDataSet* tSet );
00083 
00084         //private methods
00085         //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 private:
00087         inline double getOutputErrorGradient( double desiredValue, double outputValue );
00088         double getHiddenErrorGradient( int layer, int row );
00089         void runTrainingEpoch( std::vector<dataEntry*> &trainingSet );
00090         void backpropagate(const double* desiredOutputs);
00091         void updateWeights();
00092 };
